channel.title: Drf on Joost Plattel

item.title: Watermelon
item.description:
In two weeks I created the first REST API for a chatbot service that Watermelon is offering to their clients.

Once I got started I also converted their current stack to support Docker & implemented an auth gateway that would take in older auth flows and support better authentication for the API. The API was build in python & Django with Django Rest Framework (DRF)
